name: ktapi
description: A Javascript API to access kadcontrade

scripts.prepublish: npm run default-rollup && npm run nopusher-rollup
scripts.nopusher-rollup: metascript src/index.js -NO_PUSHER >src/processedp.js && rollup -c -i src/processedp.js -o target/ktapi-nopusher.js && rm src/processedp.js
scripts.custom-rollup: metascript src/index.js $META_PARAMS >src/processedc.js && rollup -c -i src/processedc.js -o target/ktapi-custom.js && rm src/processedc.js

author: 125m125
